history.comment: change deprecated Place type to agora
added CFL/AGO reference provided by cbouras
added Arachne 500026: Agora von Athen Athen
add ToposText reference provided by bkiesling
Cleaned up extraneous whitespace in description. See https://github.com/isawnyu/pleiades-gazetteer/issues/140.

locations.description: Location of the archaeological site of the Ancient Agora of Athens based on OpenStreetMap

history.comment:
Change to an "associated modern location", since this OSM location gives the borders of the modern archaeological park, which are not coterminous with the ancient Agora (it includes land outside the Agora to the south and excludes unexcavated areas of the Agora to the north)
https://pleiades.stoa.org/help/editorial-guidelines#section-7 says "Note that geometry associated with the modern extent of an archaeological area or preserve should be treated as an Associated Modern Location (q.v.)."
Reimported full relation geometry and updated provenance
